justification: "Participants rated their decision confidence on a 50-point 50–100 % scale by moving a slider along the scale to indicate their confidence in their orientation judgement."
"To quantify objective performance we used the Signal Detection Theory (SDT) measure d'."
"To quantify metacognitive performance we used the measure m-ratio, which reflects the SDT-optimality of participants' type 2 (metacognitive) performance."

measured_by: difficulty context manipulation (blocks with mostly easy vs. hard trials)
justification: "We operationalized self-efficacy by inducing (statistical) expectations that task performance will be high versus low, learned over the course of a block… participants performed blocks where either most trials were relatively easy (easy context… high self-efficacy) or most were relatively difficult (hard context… low self-efficacy)."
